title: Adhesive Backed Gaskets
content: SRP has been providing custom converted adhesive backed gaskets and seals to various industries since 1951. We exceed customer expectations through exceptional customer service, quality manufacturing, competitive pricing and on-time delivery.
description: SRP has been providing custom converted adhesive backed gaskets and seals to various industries since 1951.

seo.title: Adhesive Backed Gaskets
seo.description: SRP has been providing custom converted adhesive backed gaskets and seals to various industries since 1951.

blocks.title: Choosing the right adhesive backed gasket:
blocks.content:
• Adhesion properties – What is the gasket sticking to?
  • Temperature capabilities – What temperature range is required?
  • Chemical compatibility – Will the gasket be exposed to any chemicals?
  • UV resistance – Will the gasket be exposed to outdoor elements?
  • Special properties – Electrically/thermally conductive, flame retardant?

blocks.title: Benefits
blocks.content:
• Attach gaskets to metal, plastic, glass, wood and more
  • Peel and stick for quicker assembly times
  • Gasket positioning
  • Add dimensional stability
  • Can be supplied kiss-cut on a roll for even quicker assembly
  • Mounting displays, signs, posters, mirrors, name-plates

blocks.title: Typical Materials Used for Adhesive Backed Gaskets
blocks.content:
• 3M Adhesive Transfer Tapes
  • PORON 4701-30 Polyurethane
  • BISCO HT-800 Silicone Foam
  • Closed Cell Sponge Rubber Gaskets
  • Ensolite Closed Cell Foam
  • HyPUR-cel Polyurethane Foam
  • Griswold Open Cell Sponge

blocks.title: Applications
blocks.content:
• Gasketing & Sealing
  • Bonding & Attaching
  • LED Lighting
  • Thermal Solutions
  • Cushioning
  • Battery Pads & Cushions
  • Gap Filling
  • Shock Absorption & Vibration Control

suppliers.title: Adchem Corporation
suppliers.content:
Adchem adhesive tapes have been helping customers since 1965: tried and true PSA tape products from a growing selection of standard items, strategic, problem solving ideas from their application engineers.

Hundreds of off-the-shelf proven products supported by:

  • Expert applications analysis
  • Technical Service testing
  • Proactive testing and publication of bonding systems for new foams, finishes, and LSE substrates

Engineered variations to standard products employing:

  • 50 different rubber and acrylic adhesives with caliper variations, alternate liners, and new carriers

Engineered new product design and development

  • Proven development process with hundreds of applications based on detailed substrate, application, fabrication, evaluation and logistics analysis R&D and executive level collaborative project management

suppliers.title: Avery Dennison
suppliers.content:
FT EZ-8

Avery Dennison™ FT EZ-8 is ideal for applications requiring initial lamination to polyether or polyester foams and temporary removability from the user substrate.

Features

  • Different rubber based adhesive on each side of a polyester carrier
  • Densified kraft release liner

Benefits

  • Excellent processing and die-cutting stability
  • Unwind adhesive excellent for foam bonding
  • Liner side adhesive provides short term removability from most metal surfaces

Construction

  • Liner: 80# White Kraft
  • Adhesive 1: Rubber
  • Carrier: Polyester
  • Adhesive 2: Rubber
suppliers.description: A Global Leader in Materials Science and Manufaturing

suppliers.title: 3M
suppliers.description: Over 50 years working with 3M gives us the opportunity to provide you VIP service from material sampling to prototyping—to full manufacturing, packaging, and delivery.
